          About me
        
        
          
            Meet Ali Hamza Kamboh, known as ahkamboh, a Software Engineer and  AI Product Developer with over 4 years of experience in web and app development. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.
        
        
        
            If you're looking for someone who excels in building AI applications and websites, look no further. I focus on creating websites and applications that are not only functional and user-friendly but also visually appealing. By adding a personal touch, I ensure your product stands out and is easy to use. My goal is to convey your message and identity in the most creative and effective way possible. In just 30 days, I can help you launch your Minimum Viable Product (MVP) into the market. You can check out my current projects to see the innovative work I‚Äôve been doing.

            Education
          

          

            

              High School Degree
              
              CDG Boys School
           
              2007 to 2020

              
                I began my early education in my village, Ranched, Sheikhpura, Punjab, Pakistan. Despite the challenges, this experience shaped my determination to seek better opportunities. I moved to Lahore for higher quality education, completing my primary and high school education there. I graduated with an  A grade, reflecting my commitment and academic excellence.
              

            

            

              High School Secondary Degree
              
              Beacon House
           
              2020 to 2022 
              
                Embarking on my academic journey, I built a strong foundation and passion for learning. My education through  Secondary levels provided valuable academic knowledge and life skills. This comprehensive background has been crucial in shaping my achievements and personal growth. I completed my high school education at Concordia, a project of Beaconhouse, where I graduated with an A+ grade.
              
            

            

              Bachelor Computer Science
              
              UMT
           
              2023 to 2027

              
                Embarking on my degree journey, I eagerly anticipate the academic challenges ahead, driven by a passion for knowledge and a desire to excel. With aspirations set on obtaining a Bachelor's in Computer Science, I look forward to immersing myself in the dynamic world of technology, acquiring skills that will pave the way for a rewarding and impactful career in the field. This next chapter holds the promise of further shaping my expertise and nurturing my enthusiasm for the ever-evolving realm of computer science.

                attractive. Moreover, I add personal touch to your product and make sure that is eye-catching and easy
                to use. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way.

I have developed 95% of the frontend and integrated three AI tools: a resume builder, a cover letter generator, and a recommendation letter generator. This ongoing experience has honed my skills in writing quality code, collaborating with team members, and gaining valuable insights from senior developers.

                                  A Glimpse Of Past
                        
                  She is thinking of loneliness or silence.
                  Now I am separated from her existence. 
                  
                  You think about those moments, Ali.
                   Just be ashamed of the hope you put in the stranger.(Na_mehram)
                  
                   Now, Only there should be no anxiety at this age of youth. 
                   Your light of youth is still there, choose the path of righteousness.
                  
                   Now if you want to change yourself. 
                   Intercession is given if you obey the ordersof Allah.
                  
                   It is not necessary that only a woman should cover her veil. 
                   It's your duty too, to bow your eyes and head.

                  A cleft aroma       

                  This cleft in the chin of yours.
                  The warmth of it flows in my heart.
                  
                  Fieriness, such that of seas and mountains, drinking rage.
                  But only is my heart in which you exist. 

                  Not only the dimples on your face are
                  testimonials of beauty.
                  The cleft in your chin also fluxes over the heart.

                  Who knows what sort of people fall into this dent?
                  Then in the hypocrisy of this heart, go to sleep.

                  This sleep manifests dreams of love first.
                  Then in the completion of dreams (that aroma of sleep) burn 'em in the fire of heart and liver.

                  
                  Neither do they wake up nor can anyone wake them up.
                  This is not the deceiving of buds, it's only their insight into loneliness.

                  Anyone who wants to be free from this deception.
                  He, on the contrary, dives into the blood of the liver's river. 
                  
                  Oh man! Leave , this addiction for the riddance of deceit.
                  Come in the refuge of Allah and wipe out this loneliness.

                  Virtual love only makes man, a slave of another.
                  Love of God, however, makes a man to man, a human.

                                  A Glimpse Of Past
                        
                  She is thinking of loneliness or silence.
                  Now I am separated from her existence. 
                  
                  You think about those moments, Ali.
                   Just be ashamed of the hope you put in the stranger.(Na_mehram)
                  
                   Now, Only there should be no anxiety at this age of youth. 
                   Your light of youth is still there, choose the path of righteousness.
                  
                   Now if you want to change yourself. 
                   Intercession is given if you obey the ordersof Allah.
                  
                   It is not necessary that only a woman should cover her veil. 
                   It's your duty too, to bow your eyes and head.

                  A cleft aroma       

                  This cleft in the chin of yours.
                  The warmth of it flows in my heart.
                  
                  Fieriness, such that of seas and mountains, drinking rage.
                  But only is my heart in which you exist. 

                  Not only the dimples on your face are
                  testimonials of beauty.
                  The cleft in your chin also fluxes over the heart.

                  Who knows what sort of people fall into this dent?
                  Then in the hypocrisy of this heart, go to sleep.

                  This sleep manifests dreams of love first.
                  Then in the completion of dreams (that aroma of sleep) burn 'em in the fire of heart and liver.

                  
                  Neither do they wake up nor can anyone wake them up.
                  This is not the deceiving of buds, it's only their insight into loneliness.

                  Anyone who wants to be free from this deception.
                  He, on the contrary, dives into the blood of the liver's river. 
                  
                  Oh man! Leave , this addiction for the riddance of deceit.
                  Come in the refuge of Allah and wipe out this loneliness.

                  Virtual love only makes man, a slave of another.
                  Love of God, however, makes a man to man, a human.
